title.narrative: DRC Inga 3 and Mid-Size Hydropower Development TA

description.narrative: The proposed Project Development Objective (PDO) is to contribute to the sustainable development of Inga 3 Basse Chute (BC) and selected mid-size hydropower projects.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Hydraulic Resources and Electricity

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :ADEPI established, staffed and operational | Description :The Recipient shall take all measures necessary orsimply desirable in order to cause ADEPI to: (a) be established, (b) recruit a project director, a procurement specialist and afinancial management specialist, in each case with terms of reference, qualifications and experience acceptable to the Association,and (c) be fully operational, all no later than by December, 31, 2014, or such other date | Due Date :31-Dec-2014.

Finance Agreement :Dam Safety Expert Panel | Description :The Recipient shall establish by no later than June 30, 2014, andthereafter maintain, the Dam Safety Expert Panel with ToRs, experience and qualifications acceptable to the Association. | Due Date:30-Jun-2014.

Finance Agreement :Environmental and Social Expert Panel | Description :The Recipient shall establish by no later than June 30,2014, and thereafter maintain, the Environmental and Social Experts Panel with ToRs, experience and qualifications acceptable tothe Association. | Due Date :30-Jun-2014.

Finance Agreement :Internal and external auditors | Description :The Recipient shall recruit, no later than three (3) months afterthe Effective Date, (i) an independent external auditor for the Project; and (ii) an internal auditor for the Project. | Due Date:30-Sep-2014.

Finance Agreement: ADEPI establishment process | Description: Recipient shall exchange views with the Association regarding thelikelihood of the establishment of ADEPI. In the event that, following such exchange, or in the absence of such exchange forwhatever reason, the Association considers it unlikely that ADEPI will be established by Sept 30, 2014, then the Prime Minister'sOffice of the Recipient shall agree a written action plan with the Association | Due Date :30-Sep-2014.
Finance Agreement: Co-financing effectiveness | Description: The Co-financing Deadline for the effectiveness of each of theCo-financing Agreements is June 30, 2014. | Due Date :30-Jun-2014.

Finance Agreement: PIM and E&S roadmap | Description: The Recipient shall, throughout the implementation of the Project, carry outthe Project in accordance with the PIM and the E&S Studies Roadmap; provided, however, that, in the event of any conflict betweenthe provisions of the Project Implementation Manual or the E&S Studies Roadmap, on the one hand, and those of this Agreement, onthe other hand, this Agreement shall prevail. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS.

Finance Agreement: SAPP T-lines | Description: The Recipient shall use its best effort to ensure that all terms of reference forany Safeguards Instrument prepared in connection with the SAPP Transmission Line are (i) consistent with, and pay due attention to,the Association's Environmental and Social Safeguards Policies; and (ii) submitted in draft form to the Association for priorreview and comment. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS.

Finance Agreement: Signature of the Exclusive Collaboration Agreement | Description: The Exclusive Collaboration Agreement shallonly be signed following the establishment of the ADEPI and shall be signed by the Chairman of the Board of Directors of ADEPI. |Due Date : Once ADEPI established.
